work.name: Storage/Eng. Team, Dnotitia

work.name: Storage Team, Tmax Cloud

work.name: Storage Team, Tmax Tibero (Dispatched from Tmax Cloud)
work.summary: Developed and improved Tibero Active Storage (TAS), a dedicated storage system that provides high availability and performance for Tibero (DBMS), and also developed ZetaData, Tibero's high-performance appliance product.

publications.name: Practical privacy-preserving face authentication for smartphones secure against malicious clients
publications.publisher: IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security
publications.summary: A privacy-preserving face authentication system for smartphones is proposed, ensuring security against malicious clients and honest-but-curious servers through homomorphic encryption-based Euclidean distance computation and a blinding technique.

publications.name: Privacy-preserving peer-to-peer energy trading in blockchain-enabled smart grids using functional encryption
publications.summary: A blockchain-based P2P energy trading system is proposed, using functional encryption to protect bid data while ensuring publicly verifiable peer matching through smart contracts.

publications.name: Security analysis and improvement of fingerprint authentication for smartphones
publications.summary: A security analysis of a smartphone fingerprint verification service reveals vulnerabilities that allow a malicious app to extract fingerprint images via interprocess communication and decrypt stored fingerprint features, with proposed countermeasures to mitigate these risks.

publications.name: Privacy-preserving electricity billing system using functional encryption
publications.summary: A privacy-preserving electricity billing method using functional encryption is proposed, ensuring data privacy without compromising measurement quality, with feasibility demonstrated through a prototype system using real-world smart meter data.

publications.name: Privacy-Preserving K-means Clustering using Homomorphic Encryption in a Multiple Clients Environment
publications.publisher: The Journal of Korean Institute of Next Generation Computing
publications.summary: A privacy-preserving K-means clustering method using homomorphic encryption is proposed, enabling machine learning while protecting client data privacy, with feasibility demonstrated in a multi-client model.

publications.name: Secure power demand forecasting using regression analysis on Intel SGX
publications.publisher: The Journal of Korean Institute of Next Generation Computing
publications.summary: A secure power demand forecasting method using regression analysis within Intel SGX is proposed, ensuring user privacy while achieving lower average error rates compared to existing privacy-preserving approaches.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
